DOC.detailed_description: The propose pilot-study document feasibility , safety efficacy topically apply Glucoprime gel ( GLYC-101 gel 1.0 % ) promoting wound heal healthy volunteer subject undergoing retro-auricular Carbon Dioxide Laser Skin Resurfacing ( CO2 LSR ) . The study observe effect topical agent course 1 month follow treatment . preparation study GLYC-101-1b ( Double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled Phase 2 Pilot Study investigate safety efficacy 1.0 % topically apply GLYC 101 compare placebo , patient undergo Carbon Dioxide Laser Skin Resurfacing ) .
